ComicInfo.Title: Destroy All Vampires; Mark 8:22-9:13
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-15 10:46:05. [CVDB237815] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 17:19:38. [Issue ID 174887]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Destroy All Vampires: Josie suddenly comes back to life, finds out (in a flashback sequence) she's now a vampire and then goes back into her body. One of the Vampire Killers kill the Pygmy hunter. Ed and Josie escape from the Adventures in Science building by Josie turning into a bat and flying away with Ed in tow.
Mark 8:22-9:13: Jesus and his followers come to Bethsaida and Jesus talks to Elijah and Moses on a high mountain.
ComicInfo.Characters: Unnamed Pygymy Hunter (Fiona's Mum),Unnamed Nurse,Unnamed Police Captain,Quincy and Quincy, Vampire Killers,Dead Pygmies,Annie Doodley (baby spirit)
